item.title: Project 4: Convert spotify dataframe to 3NF and create SQL schema
item.description: Overview This is the fourth project for BIOSTAT 823 (2020 Fall) This project requires to Create a SQLite3 schema to store spotify data in at least 3rd normal form (3NF) and use an SQL query to find the names of all playlists that contain instrumentals I used python to do the normalization and stored the transformed dataframe into a SQL database. I’ll show how I do it in the following sections:
